title: The Tyrant Wants To Live Honestly - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Nobles   Royalty   Second Chance
author: 람글
description:
Dorothy, a woman who suffered discrimination and disregard.

She was driven to the point of murdering her elder brother, and afterward rose to power as emperor…but unloved by all, even by her sweetheart, she was ultimately denounced as a tyrant and sentenced to execution.

But then she opened her eyes to find herself in her childhood days.

“It can’t end like that again.”

I won’t commit the same regrets.

I’m going to live honestly.

This time, in this life, that is my goal.>
